targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM $table
WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'MOEX' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDate(1364390864) AND date <= toDate(1651069664)
    and sec_code == 'MOEX' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT date_add(day, 30 , quarter) as q, last_value(value), name
FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Net profit')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT date_add(day, 30 , quarter) as q, last_value(value), name
FROM default.databook
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1364390293) and q < toDateTime(1640614693) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Net profit')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT date_pub as t, value as dividend
FROM $table
WHERE t >= toDateTime($from) and t < toDateTime($to) 
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT date_pub as t, value as dividend
FROM default.dividend
WHERE t >= toDateTime(1364390629) and t < toDateTime(1651069429) 
ORDER BY t

    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'MOEX' and period == '5'

FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to)

and name in ('Net profit')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value), name
FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Net profit')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value), name
FROM default.databook
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1514464016) and q < toDateTime(1640694416) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Net profit')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT quarter as q, cbrt(
(
  last_value(value) + last_value(neighbor(value, -1)) + last_value(neighbor(value, -2)) + last_value(neighbor(value, -3))
)/4/last_value(neighbor(value, -3))) -1 as "Net growth"
FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from - 26982500) and q < toDateTime($to) and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name = 'Net profit'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT quarter as q, cbrt(
(
  last_value(value) + last_value(neighbor(value, -1)) + last_value(neighbor(value, -2)) + last_value(neighbor(value, -3))
)/4/last_value(neighbor(value, -3))) -1 as "Net growth"
FROM default.databook
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1514464016 - 26982500) and q < toDateTime(1640694416) and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name = 'Net profit'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT np.quarter as q, last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150 as "Net profit"
FROM $table as np
JOIN $table as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN $table as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT np.quarter as q, last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150 as "Net profit"
FROM default.databook as np
JOIN default.databook as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN default.databook as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1514462867) and q < toDateTime(1640693267) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT np.quarter as q, 
pow(((
(last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -1))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -1))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -1))+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -2))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -2))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -2))+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150)
)/4) /
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150), 1/3) -1
 as "Net growth avg 12M CAGR"
FROM $table as np
JOIN $table as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN $table as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT np.quarter as q, 
pow(((
(last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -1))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -1))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -1))+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -2))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -2))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -2))+3900+150) +
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150)
)/4) /
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150), 1/3) -1
 as "Net growth avg 12M CAGR"
FROM default.databook as np
JOIN default.databook as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN default.databook as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1514462867) and q < toDateTime(1640693267) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT np.quarter as q, 
pow((last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150)/
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150), 1/4)
-1 as "Net growth 12M CAGR"
FROM $table as np
JOIN $table as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN $table as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT np.quarter as q, 
pow((last_value(np.value)-last_value(fc.value)-last_value(oe.value)+3900+150)/
(last_value(neighbor(np.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(fc.value, -3))-last_value(neighbor(oe.value, -3))+3900+150), 1/4)
-1 as "Net growth 12M CAGR"
FROM default.databook as np
JOIN default.databook as fc on (fc.code == np.code and np.content == fc.content and fc.quarter == np.quarter)
JOIN default.databook as oe on (oe.code == np.code and np.content == oe.content and oe.quarter == np.quarter)
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1514462867) and q < toDateTime(1640693267) 
and np.code == 'MOEX' and np.content == '3. P&L - reporting periods' and fc.name == 'Interest and other finance income'
and np.name == 'Net profit' and oe.name == 'Other operating expenses'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value)*-1, name
FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('General and administrative expenses', 'Personnel expenses', 'Other operating expenses', 'Income tax expense')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value)*-1, name
FROM default.databook
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1482694527) and q < toDateTime(1640460927) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('General and administrative expenses', 'Personnel expenses', 'Other operating expenses', 'Income tax expense')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value), name
FROM $table
WHERE q >= toDateTime($from) and q < toDateTime($to) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Money market', 'Depository and settlement services', 
'Securities market', 'Foreign exchange', 'Derivatives', 'Information services', 
'Sale of software and technical services','Other')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT quarter as q, last_value(value), name
FROM default.databook
WHERE q >= toDateTime(1482691423) and q < toDateTime(1640457823) 
and code == 'MOEX' and content == '3. P&L - reporting periods'
and name in ('Money market', 'Depository and settlement services', 
'Securities market', 'Foreign exchange', 'Derivatives', 'Information services', 
'Sale of software and technical services','Other')
GROUP BY q, name
ORDER BY q, sum(value)
